cookie.message: We use cookies for features like comfortable course enrollment without creating an account. By continuing to use the site, you accept cookies.
footer.description: Speed up your robotics learning with courses, documents and games prepared by FIRST teams.
footer.sponsor_text: Special thanks to our valued sponsor
footer.sponsor_thanks: for their contributions to RookieVerse's development!
index.title: Home - FIRST Rookieverse
index.badge: Videos, documents and games specially for Rookies.
index.hero_desc: All Turkish documentation and training videos prepared by Turkish FIRST teams are now under one roof! Rookie members, start your robotics adventure strong by effortlessly accessing the resources you need.
index.why_desc: Benefit from interactive content and real-world experiences prepared by experienced students of Turkish FIRST teams.
index.feature1_desc: Detailed course content covering all areas of FIRST programs (FRC, FTC, FLL). Learn from beginner to advanced level.
index.feature2_desc: Reinforce what you've learned with fun games. Make the learning process enjoyable.
index.feature3_desc: Ask your questions about documents or videos to FIRST teams in Turkey in line with the project's purpose.
index.featured_desc: Start your FIRST journey with our most popular and effective courses
index.contributors_desc: Valuable FIRST teams that contribute to the development of this platform
index.cta_title: Ready to Take the First Step in Your FIRST Adventure?
index.cta_desc: All the resources to guide you in the robotics world are here. We carry both individual participants and teams to success with our free educational content and team support programs.
courses.title: Courses
courses.description: Find all the information you need about FIRST programs (FRC, FTC, FLL) in our comprehensive courses organized by category.
teams.title: All Teams
teams.search_placeholder: Search by team name or number‚Ä¶
teams.no_results: No teams found matching your criteria.
games.title: Games
games.description: Have fun while learning with FIRST terms. Choose any game and start right away.
games.search_placeholder: Search games (e.g. letter, quiz, guess, match)
contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Reach out to us for your questions, suggestions, or feedback. We are happy to support the FIRST community.
contact.form_desc: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Full Name *
contact.subject: Subject *
contact.success_desc: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.error_recaptcha: Please check the "I am not a robot" box.
contact.faq1_a: Yes! All courses and games on Rookieverse are completely free. We developed this platform to support the Turkish FIRST community.
contact.faq2_q: How to start a new team?
contact.faq2_a: To start a new team, you first need to register with FIRST. We have detailed guides to help you through this process.
contact.faq3_q: Can I get a course certificate?
contact.faq3_a: The certificate system is currently under development. We plan to offer course completion certificates soon.
contact.faq4_a: You can download PDF versions and videos of our courses for offline use.
course_detail.title: Course Detail
course_detail.questions_desc: Ask anything related to the lesson.
course_detail.char_limit: Your question must not exceed 250 characters.
course_detail.enroll_required: You must enroll to ask a question.
course_detail.ask_hint: Being polite and clear increases your chance of getting a response. Your comment will be hidden until approved by the team.
course_detail.no_questions: No questions yet. Be the first to ask!
course_detail.view_team: Click to see all courses from this team
course_detail.enroll_modal_desc: You need to enroll for free to view this module.
course_detail.enroll_modal_note: After enrollment, you get unlimited access to all modules.
team_login.title: Team Panel Login
team_login.description: Enter your credentials to access the panel.
team_login.session_error: Session verification failed. Please refresh and try again.
team_panel.no_courses: You don't have any courses yet.
create_course.course_name_placeholder: Give your course an engaging title...
create_course.about_placeholder: Describe what this course covers in general...
create_course.goal_placeholder: Describe what a student will achieve after completing this course...
create_course.learnings_placeholder: List the topics you will teach (each line is a new item)...
create_course.unsaved_warning: You have unsaved changes. They will be lost if you leave.
edit_course.status_desc: Status management is determined by the admin panel.
edit_course.yt_note: File upload and YouTube link are mutually exclusive. File upload is hidden when using YouTube.
wg.title: FRC Word Guess
wg.subtitle: Try to find the described FRC term!
wg.pick_letter: Pick a letter or guess the word:
mc.title: FRC Quiz
mc.subtitle: Test your knowledge and get the highest score!
fc.title: FRC Flashcards
fc.hint: Hint: Flip the card and rate with A/G.
fc.done_desc: You can shuffle again or start a new session.
gg.title: FRC Team Riddle
gg.subtitle: Find the correct number from the team name!
gg.no_teams: No teams found for selected criteria. Please try a different selection.
tb.title: FRC Taboo
tb.subtitle: Describe the word without using the taboo words.
fm.title: FRC Memory Game
fm.subtitle: Find the matching pairs of cards!
